timeline.message:
Update ExtractRecycleBin.java

Add $RECYCLE.BIN as the directory to look for $I files.

Update ExtractRecycleBin.java

Update exceptions caught and thrown.  Update comments.  Add file and path name to logging message for future debugging if needed.

timeline.bodyText: Why remove the formatting? Did this not build /format properly in doxygen? Does it build /format properly now?
timeline.author: rcordovano

replies.bodyText:
Install Doxygen.
http://www.doxygen.nl/download.html
Download and run the Windows installer.
Run doxygen for Sleuthkit in ~sleuthkit/bindings/java/doxygen, then run doxygen for Autopsy in ~autopsy/docs/doxygen, ~autopsy/docs/doxygen-user, and ~autopsy/docs/doxygen-dev
replies.author: rcordovano

replies.bodyText: From what I see that table never shows up in the docs.  I also checked online in the 4.13 docs and I do not see it as well.
replies.author: markmckinnon

replies.bodyText: Actually, that makes sense - this is not a public class. I'll accept the PR as is.
replies.author: rcordovano
